text: Kings City was an amusement park in Eilat, Israel. It is located in the hotels area of the city. The amusement park is dedicated to the Bible and was open in 2005 at a cost of US$40,000,000, and closed in 2015. == Gallery == File:PikiWiki Israel 18736 Kings City in Eilat.JPG|View from above File:PikiWiki Israel 8091 kings city in eilat.jpg|Water slide File:PikiWiki Israel 8206 kings city eilat.jpg|Image of ancient Egypt == Other websites == * Kings City website * Kings City under construction * Photo gallery, August 2005 (111 photos) Category:Theme parks in Israel Category:Eilat
title: Kings City
